name: Square Sam's Strange Adventure
description:
This is a Zombie shooter type game, made for the 119th Mini jam, it is currently 3:37 am as I am writing this, and there is a dog behind me begging for me to turn off my lights.

One thing i forgot to mention in the game is that the dash moves towards where you're looking, not where you're moving towards, if you have more questions, click the question mark button on the main menu lol.
